name: Freedom to Fly
description:
Out of all the animals in nature,

the foxes and the squirrels,

the ones said to be most free

are the birds, because they can fly

anywhere!

However, since they have to scavenge

and hunt for food, and even fight

other birds for it, are they ever

truly free?

Find out for yourself in Freedom to

Fly!

Take control of one of four robins

in the skies above the city, and

collect breadcrumbs to eat and survive.

AS you eat, you'll find yourself

growing into larger and stronger birds.

Become the strongest, and have the

other birds serve you!
